messages.subject: math cd-rom

messages.messageBody:
Thanks to all for math cd-rom suggestions recently... We got Mathquest with
Aladdin by Disney a couple days ago, and my 7yo boy really seems to enjoy
it. It's giving him good practice in adding and subtracting and has a lot of
little logic games. Nice calm music too.

Chumbo.com was out of stock on many of the titles that interested me,
though. Several of the titles were by a publisher called Broderbund, but
when I tried to get to their web site, I was directed to Mattel instead. I
suppose there's been a buyout or something. Even there many of the title
were out of stock.

If anyone has any other good sources for educational CD-roms, I'd be
interested!

Thanks.

Annette
